general.name: addArrayValueByKey
general.shortDesc: Adds a new value with a key in a variable.

definition.desc: Adds a new value to the array session variable varName. The value is inserted as an associative array, being the key of the new element the 'key' argument.

params.name: varValue
params.desc: Value to insert in the variable.

params.name: key
params.desc: Key of the new element added to the array.

definition.return: This function does not return any value.
